articles.description: FDA has revised the emergency use authorization for Evusheld (tixagevimab co-packaged with cilgavimab) to change the initial dose for the authorized used as pre-exposure prophylaxis (prevention) of COVID-19 in certain adults and certain pediatric patients.
articles.content: [2/24/2022] The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has revised the emergency use authorization for Evusheld (tixagevimab co-packaged with cilgavimab) to change the initial dose for the authorized use … [+4808 chars]
